system.requirements:
Tier 1; Agility 30
Aptitudes; Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Unaligned
system.effect: Character can use either hand equally well for any task, and does not suffer -20 for using their offhand. When combined with Two-Weapon Wielder Talent, reduces the penalty for making an attack with both weapons to -10.
